title: Indonesia president vows to rebuild after volcano eruption as death toll rises to 34
content:
1. Indonesia president vows to rebuild after volcano eruption as death toll rises to 34  The Guardian
  2. Photos From Indonesia Volcano: Death Toll Rises  The New York Times
  3. Drone captures village damage from Semeru eruption  Reuters
  4. At least 34 killed in Indonesia volcano eruption; president vows to rebuild  NBC News
  5. Drone footage reveals damage from Indonesia's Mount Semeru volcano eruption  Guardian News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: インドネシア大統領、火山噴火後の復興を宣言 死者数は34人に上る
印尼总统誓言在火山爆发后进行重建，死亡人数上升至34人
印尼總統誓言在火山爆發後進行重建，死亡人數上升至34人
